channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: Without Influence
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (Harry M. Dean)
item.description: Herbert Stanlaw was waiting for the burglar, with a plan to outsmart him and keep his precious ruby. But would his tale of the ruby's curse keep the thief from stealing his valuables? Or would the thief outwit him in the end?
